Root System Generator Distances¶

Root System Library

A library for computing dissimilarities between data from synthetic root system generation.

root_system_lib.distances.distance_euclidean(e: float, obs: ndarray, sim: ndarray) → Tuple[ndarray, float][source]¶

Computes Euclidean distance between data.

e: float

Epsilon parameter for compatability with PyMC3.

obs: array (float)

Observed data.

sim: array (float)

Simulated data.

distancefloat | array (float)

The computed euclidean distances.
